Name: Spinach Pasta
Blurb: This is a simple healthy dish which is made even better if you use fresh organic spinach.
Ingredients: Half a bottle of pasta sauce
Instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water and drain.
Brown onions, then add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook until mushrooms are tender, then add spinach leaves and cooked spaghetti.
Cook until spinach leaves are tender.
Serve on plate with shredded cheese and drizzle over with olive oil.
